alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 12:03AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Santa Rosa and central Escambia Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1103 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles north of Gonzalez, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzalez, Molino and Jay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Inland
